description:
Secure remote access and support

TeamViewer is a comprehensive, remote access, remote control and remote support solution that works with almost every desktop and mobile platform, including Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS.
TeamViewer lets you remote in to computers or mobile devices located anywhere in the world and use them as though you were there.
New Features
- Try the all-new TeamViewer Remote!

Improvements
- Port forwarding now has local IP mapping enabled by default. Supporters no longer need to manually activate this setting.

Bugfixes
- Fixed a critical issue that could cause a delay when connecting to devices.
- Windows LAPS integration: UAC autofill reliability has been improved.
